name: Walmart
description: Walmart is a multinational retail corporation that operates a chain of hypermarkets.

name: Volvo
description: Volvo is a Swedish multinational manufacturing company known for trucks and cars.

name: Okta
description: Okta provides secure identity management and single sign-on services.

name: Cisco
description: Cisco designs, manufactures, and sells networking equipment worldwide.

name: Deloitte
description: Deloitte is a multinational professional services network offering audit, consulting, and advisory.

name: Apple
description: Apple designs and sells consumer electronics, computer software, and online services.

name: Google
description: Google specializes in internet-related services and products including online advertising.

name: Microsoft
description: Microsoft develops, manufactures, licenses, and supports software products and services.

name: Amazon
description: Amazon focuses on e-commerce, cloud computing, digital streaming, and AI services.

name: Facebook
description: Facebook is a social networking company, part of Meta Platforms, Inc.

name: IBM
description: IBM offers hardware, software, cloud-based services and cognitive computing.

name: Airbnb
description: Airbnb operates an online marketplace for lodging and tourism experiences.

name: Spotify
description: Spotify offers audio streaming services worldwide.

name: Netflix
description: Netflix is a subscription streaming service offering TV shows and movies.

name: Tesla
description: Tesla specializes in electric vehicles, energy storage, and solar panel manufacturing.

name: Nike
description: Nike designs, develops, and sells footwear, apparel, and accessories worldwide.

name: Adobe
description: Adobe creates multimedia and creativity software products.

name: Salesforce
description: Salesforce provides customer relationship management software and cloud computing.

name: Starbucks
description: Starbucks operates as a global coffee company and coffeehouse chain.

name: Uber
description: Uber offers ride-hailing, food delivery, and freight transportation services.
